original_text: When she and the members of her household were baptized, she invited us to her home. “If you consider me a believer in the Lord,” she said, “come and stay at my house.” And she persuaded us.
korean_text: 그와 그 집이 다 세례를 받고 우리에게 청하여 이르되 만일 나를 주 믿는 자로 알거든 내 집에 들어와 유하라 하고 강권하여 머물게 하니라

sentences.original_text: When she and the members of her household were baptized
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀와 그녀의 가족 세대가 세례를 받았을 때

sentences.original_text: she invited us to her home
If you consider me a believer in the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 나를 주 안의 믿는 자로 여긴다면

sentences.original_text: come and stay at my house
